issue.title: [CI] Add substrait support to python wheels
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16668](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16668). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We are not building wheels with substrait as seen on these builds:
<https://github.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/runs/6588182160?check_suite_focus=true#step:7:572>

We should add it to the nightlies and default wheels. From my understanding it should be enough to add it here: <font color="#e01e5a">ci/scripts/python_wheel_manylinux_build.sh</font>
